title: BUFF JHIN'S AUTOS FFS
body: Jhin has became near uselesss and absolutely abysmal to use after stormrazor being yanked away, I shouldnt need to rely on a 25 % chance to survive one ability because i move at a snails pace, Not to mention kiting is completely absent without having 100 crit.{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Even thought he is a tier 5 ADC i don't think he needs a buff, instead nerfing ADC's that are to strong like vayne is a good idea. (Which they are doing)

Uhh...

I have 68% WR on Jhin mid (into assassins primarily) if i can win lane against his direct counter, what part of him needs a buff, if anything he's in need of a nerf to his movespeed.

As a support main (normally) jhin is the biggest pain in the ass to catch because of his movespeed.

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Probs don't make threads if you've got no clue about him and do some research lmao maybe even check out a Keep It Taco guide or two lmao
jhin has 10000 move speed each auto what are you talking about
